item.title: Github Developer Database
item.description: Github Developer Database Mission Open database to promote oss development Problem Github relations are difficult to visualize Developer database non-existent even in 2020 No dedicated analytics for advanced developer insight Solution OSS-driven analytics platform for advanced visualization Github relation management for promotion for developers True insight for one of the world’s important activities
item.content:encoded: Github Developer Database Mission Open database to promote oss development Problem Github relations are difficult to visualize Developer database non-existent even in 2020 No dedicated analytics for advanced developer insight Solution OSS-driven analytics platform for advanced visualization Github relation management for promotion for developers True insight for one of the world&rsquo;s important activities
